verses.verse: For <S%H6726>Zion's<s%> <S%H4616>sake<s%> will I not <S%H2814>hold<s%> my <S%H2814>peace,<s%> and for <S%H3389>Jerusalem's<s%> <S%H4616>sake<s%> I will not <S%H8252>rest,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> thereof <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> as <S%H5051>brightness,<s%> and the <S%H3444>salvation<s%> thereof as a <S%H3940>lamp<s%> that <S%H1197>burns.<s%>

And the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> your <S%H3519>glory:<s%> and you shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> by a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H8034>name.<s%>

You shall also be a <S%H5850>crown<s%> of <S%H8597>glory<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and a <S%H4410>royal<s%> <S%H6797>diadem<s%> in the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of your <S%H430>God.<s%>

You shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> be <S%H559>termed<s%> <S%H5800>Forsaken;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall your <S%H776>land<s%> any <S%H5750>more<s%> be <S%H559>termed<s%> <S%H8077>Desolate:<s%> but you shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H2657>Hephzibah,<s%> and your <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H1166>Beulah:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2654>delights<s%> in you, and your <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H1166>married.<s%>

For as a <S%H5288>young<s%> <S%H970><s%> man <S%H1166>marries<s%> a <S%H1330>virgin,<s%> so shall your <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H1166>marry<s%> you: and as the <S%H2860>bridegroom<s%> <S%H4885>rejoices<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H3618>bride,<s%> so shall your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you.

I have <S%H6485>set<s%> <S%H8104>watchmen<s%> on your <S%H2346>walls,<s%> O <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> which shall <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H2814>hold<s%> their <S%H2814>peace<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> nor <S%H3915>night:<s%> you that make <S%H2142>mention<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> keep not <S%H1824>silence,<s%>

And <S%H5414>give<s%> him <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H1824>rest,<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> he <S%H3559>establish,<s%> and <S%H5704>till<s%> he <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> a <S%H8416>praise<s%> in the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand,<s%> and by the <S%H2220>arm<s%> of his <S%H5797>strength,<s%> <S%H518>Surely<s%> I will <S%H518>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H1715>corn<s%> to be <S%H3978>meat<s%> for your <S%H341>enemies;<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5236>stranger<s%> shall not <S%H8354>drink<s%> your <S%H8492>wine,<s%> for the <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H3021>labored:<s%>

But they that have <S%H622>gathered<s%> it shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it, and <S%H1984>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and they that have <S%H6908>brought<s%> it together shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> it in the <S%H2691>courts<s%> of my <S%H6944>holiness.<s%>

<S%H5674>Go<s%> <S%H5674>through,<s%> <S%H5674>go<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H8179>gates;<s%> <S%H6437>prepare<s%> you the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H5971>people;<s%> <S%H5549>cast<s%> up, <S%H5549>cast<s%> up the <S%H4546>highway;<s%> <S%H5619>gather<s%> out the <S%H68>stones;<s%> <S%H7311>lift<s%> up a <S%H5251>standard<s%> for the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H8085>proclaimed<s%> to the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>world,<s%> <S%H559>Say<s%> you to the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> your <S%H3468>salvation<s%> <S%H935>comes;<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> his <S%H7939>reward<s%> is with him, and his <S%H6468>work<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him.

And they shall <S%H7121>call<s%> them, The <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> The <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and you shall be <S%H7121>called,<s%> <S%H1875>Sought<s%> out, A <S%H5892>city<s%> not <S%H5800>forsaken.<s%>
